title: Technician Hiring Platform (THP)
description: Full-stack web application connecting job owners with skilled technicians. Job owners can post tasks, technicians browse opportunities and submit proposals. Features real-time messaging, notifications, and review system.

title: Hotels and Flights Booking System
description: Full-stack travel agency booking application. Developed secure user authentication module with registration and password reset features using Java, JavaFX for frontend, and MySQL database.

title: Time4Meds Mobile App Design
description: Designed comprehensive mobile app enabling patients to manage medications, access health content, and communicate with doctors. Focus on intuitive UI/UX with wireframing and prototyping.

title: Social Media Platform (Web 1 Project)
description: Basic responsive website built as part of the Web 1 course. Collaborated in a 3-member team to build two core pages of a social media platform with modern UI design.

title: Quality Assurance Toolkit
description: A collection of automated QA scripts and test plans for web applications including unit, integration, and end-to-end tests. Implemented CI test pipelines and reports.

title: Data Structures Practice
description: Algorithms and data structures implementations and exercises in JavaScript and Java, with visualization utilities and performance benchmarks.
